entry.title: Prelude Manager - Bug #308: Incorrect information in file: './prelude/Prelude_Alert.frm'
entry.content: This does not look like related to the Prelude-Manager error. This is a [[MySQL]] specific error that usually happen after an [[InnoDB]] configuration change that is incompatible with the current [[InnoDB]] database settings. Did you changed your database configuration recently?

entry.title: Prelude Manager - Bug #308: Incorrect information in file: './prelude/Prelude_Alert.frm'
entry.content: Additionally, you should look at your log files to see why Prelude-Manager is not starting correctly [the reason is probably the same error you are getting from Prewikka].

entry.title: Prelude Manager - Bug #308: Incorrect information in file: './prelude/Prelude_Alert.frm'
entry.content:
• Status changed from New to Closed
  • Resolution set to invalid

I assume this is a [[MySQL]] InnoDB configuration problem, and am thus marking this bug as invalid.
Please re-open if you can confirm.

• Project changed from PRELUDE SIEM to Prelude Manager
